title: @Riot About this chat filter
body: Could someone help me understand why the chat filter is always active even when I have it disabled in both the new and legacy client?

replies.body:
Your config may not be saving your language filter toggle correctly, but we have a manual fix!  Try the following steps:

- Close League of Legends
- Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\(lat est version)\deploy\preferences
- Open up the shared(summoner name).PROPERTIES file up with Notepad
- It should say:
[Chat]
EnableChatFilter=1
- Just change the 1 to a 0. Hit Ctrl+S to save it.

I hope that helps!
thank you for sharing this as it has been happening a lot more frequently this patch, I'm gonna share this thread to my friends that have been affected as well
